chunks.chunk_text: 歡迎收聽啟稟老師的超級英語通
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: 今天要為您介紹的Office English實用語句是What did you do before lunch?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: What did you have for lunch?I had a sandwich and a cup of coffeeWhat did you do before lunch?I was playing a little online gameWhat are you going to do later?I think I'm going to continue playing my gamesYou better wish our boss wouldn't catch you playing online games during working hours
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: 中文裡面have常常呢就是表示有喫的意思所以I ate什麼東西for lunch那麼eat過去是那麼用have這個字代換也蠻不錯的所以是What did you have?你喫了什麼for lunch?所以你可以說成直述句是我中午喫個譬如說三明治我中午喫三明治就是I had a sandwich for lunch
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: 我喫了三明治Coffee是不可數的名詞所以我們常常會擺一個單位在前面我喝了一杯咖啡所以跟中文一樣一杯咖啡我們就講a cup of coffee所以他說你中午喫了什麼呢?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: And a cup of coffee我喫了三明治也喝了一杯咖啡What did you do before lunch?那你午餐前做了什麼呢?這就是我們今天的Office English使用語句What did you do before lunch?在午餐前你做了什麼?What did you do?是問的是您做了什麼?小心我們用的是debt這個助動詞所以表示是過去是您過去您在午餐之前做了什麼?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: 午餐就是午餐那麼提醒您一般說來在英文裡三餐前面是不需要加定慣詞的除非你要特別強調否則一般說before lunchafter lunchfor breakfast這樣就可以了所以我們再複習一下今天的這個重點語句就是What did you do before lunch?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: What are you going to do later?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: What are you going to do later?Later在英文裡面它是一個副詞表示就是後來稍後沒有多久之後的事我們英文就用later它其實原來來自於late後面加上一個are變成了比較急所以later就是稍後那你等等要做什麼呢?因為還沒有做但是又沒有很遠所以它就用be going to這樣的方式
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: 來表示所以What are you going to do later?您待會做什麼呢?I think I'm going to continue playing my game我應該還會繼續打電動吧I think I'm going to continueContinue這個字就是繼續做什麼什麼事情那一樣是指之後所以我們就可以講I am going toI'm going to continue playing my game我要繼續玩我的遊戲
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你最好期待著我們老闆不會抓到你在玩線上遊戲後面可以加上一個整個的句子它事實上是一個
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: Catch就是抓到逮到的意思所以抓到你正在玩這個東西要注意了Catch後面我們加上授詞之後遇到的動詞在語法上都要加上v-i-n-g表示正在做什麼事所以比如說你給我逮到在睡覺了I just caught you sleeping我剛剛抓到你睡覺
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: I caught you sleeping我逮到你在睡覺了或者是他沒有逮到你在睡覺的就是He didn't catch you sleeping那除了Catch you sleeping像這邊是Catch you playing online game玩線上遊戲During working hours在工作的時候那麼上班時間英文就叫做working hours所以上班玩遊戲真的不是太好所以要小心了那我們再來複習一下
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: 這段實用對話
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: 學習焦點
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: 今天為您介紹的重點是What did you do before?您做了什麼呢?你之前做了什麼叫做What did you do?用的是過去式來表示你之前做了什麼Before後面要加上特定的時間它是加上一個特定的時間點喔比如說我們來看看今天的例句是What did you do before meeting starts?What did you do before meeting starts?
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: 你做了什麼所以What did you do before meeting starts?下面What did you do before you come to work?在你上班前你做了什麼呢?What did you do?那麼這兩個的before都是拿來當做連接詞那麼before當然也可以做氣息詞比如說在七點以前你做了什麼你就可以問What did you do before seven o'clock?實戰演練
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: What did you do before you come to work?I had my breakfast at home他說上班前你做了什麼呢?What did you do before you come to work?他說這是早餐啊breakfast at home早餐在家裡喫好今天為您介紹的Office English實用語句是What did you do before lunch?午餐前你做了什麼呢?請記得每日十分鐘讓你變成英語通我是啟稟老師
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 辦公英語通What did you do before lunch_.json

chunks.chunk_text: 我是武聰老師我們See you next time
